## Resource Database

Use the filter/search options below to explore my collated resources. Items have been loosely categorized by topic and type of content. Please reach out with any suggestions, edits, or questions.

```{r}
library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

data <- read.csv("resources.csv") %>% 
  select(Title:Link) %>% 
  arrange(Title)

table <- reactable(
  data,
  wrap = TRUE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  paginationType = "simple",
  showPageInfo = FALSE,
  minRows = 1,
  elementId = "tbl"
)
```
